ygData.subject: RE: Maestro of Rancor
ygData.msgSnippet: yes i use evensong/six note blade combo.  i don t even have any yaks left except the one i let my warrior friend use with his dragon claw.  used the other as
ygData.messageBody:
yes i use evensong/six note blade combo. i don't even have any yaks left
except the one i let my warrior friend use with his dragon claw. used the
other as part of a trade for my wizard's robe. i can not frickin believe
someone else looted it. what kind of idiot... nevermind.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L36 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> Needless to say, I was the only bard on the plane at the time.
> Unfortunately, I have to wait until Maestro drops another, since
> the weapon was 'accidentally' looted by someone who cannot use it.
> <sigh>
>
> Do you use your evensong over your yk, Shada?
>
> Harmonic.
